eng: begin; start; commence; initiate; become; go to; come to; summon; arrive; to; change; -ify; _incohative_; SBJ {starter} makes OBJ {begun} transition from falsehood to truth {TIME:beginning|LOCATION:start}

end; stop; cease; cancel; unbecome; come from; go from; send; leave; depart; from; change; de- -ify; _cessative_; SBJ {stopper} makes OBJ {finished} transitions from truth to falsehood {TIME:ending|LOCATION:end; edge}
*yes; be true; be right; be correct; be happening; _positive_; OBJ {state; truth; reality} is happening {METHOD:process}
no; not; be false; be wrong; be incorrect; be not happening; _negative_; OBJ {falsehood; fiction} is not happening
happen; do; cause; pro-verb; SBJ {cause; participant} causes OBJ {event; effect} to come true
be; exist; have; equal; be the same; _copula_; OBJ exists and is the same thing as IND {AMOUNT:number; count; amount|GENITIVE:fair; uniform; equal}
create; make; give; get; appear; produce; SBJ {creator} makes OBJ {creation} into IND {LOCATION:factory; makery; source|METHOD:recipe}
delete; destroy; take; disappear; SBJ {deleter; destroyer} deletes OBJ {deleted; disappeared}
